original_text: My Christian friends, I want to tell you something important. Be very careful about people who teach wrong things. They teach things that are different from God's true message that you learned. Those people cause you to quarrel with each other. They cause people to turn away from God. You must stay away from them.
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 너희를 권하노니 너희가 배운 교훈을 거슬러 분쟁을 일으키거나 거치게 하는 자들을 살피고 그들에게서 떠나라

sentences.original_text: I want to tell you something important
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게 중요한 것을 말하고 싶다

sentences.original_text: that are different from God's true message
Those people cause you to quarrel with each other
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 너희가 서로 다투게 만든다

sentences.original_text: They cause people to turn away from God
You must stay away from them
